tools_documentation.wallet_balance: Fetches real-time balance for SEI wallet addresses. Supports both bech32 (sei1...) and EVM (0x...) formats.
tools_documentation.wallet_transactions: Retrieves transaction history with optional limit. Returns detailed transaction data including amounts, fees, and timestamps.
tools_documentation.analyze_wallet: Comprehensive analysis including balance, transaction patterns, risk assessment, and behavioral insights.
tools_documentation.get_latest_block: Returns current block height, timestamp, and recent transaction count from SEI network.
tools_documentation.get_chain_info: Network status, chain ID, validator information, and overall health metrics.
tools_documentation.get_market_data: Real-time pricing, market cap, volume, and trading data for SEI token.
tools_documentation.get_transaction: Detailed transaction lookup by hash including status, participants, and execution details.
tools_documentation.get_recent_events: Stream of recent blockchain events including transfers, swaps, and contract interactions.
